title: Lobby bar, In suite laundry, Outdoor firepits, Quartz countertops
posting_body: This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 548 Sq.
In the heart of Downtown Seattle’s high-tech neighbourhood, art, architecture and nature meet to form a refined rental community that quickens and slows in step with your rhythm.
Shaped by an indoor-outdoor philosophy, with social spaces that make moving between peaceful residence and pulsing city seamless, there’s no place like Ren.

In suite laundry, Ample balconies*, Stone tiling, Darkening shades in bedrooms, Highly functional kitchens, Premium appliances, Quartz countertops, Rectangular soaker tub, CommunityConnect OneApp to control suite features, Air conditioning, Luxurious bathrooms

Private meeting rooms, Secure underground car and bicycle parking, Fetch Package delivery, Top floor terrace, CommunityConnect OneApp technology to access amenities, Caterer's kitchen, Brevvie kiosks & Tide Cleaners lockers, Lobby bar, Dog spa with grooming stations, Curated art program of renowned local and international art, Top floor wet bar, Top floor private event spaces, 24/7 concierge, Fully equipped, state-of-art fitness center, Wellness room for yoga, meditation, and light aerobics, Game room, Building-wide Wi-Fi, BBQs, Top floor co-work space, Outdoor firepits
We do not accept Comprehensive Reusable Tenant Screening Reports as defined by and pursuant to RCW 59.18.
